short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Override the new tab page with Perdiem - Something new, everyday!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Perdiem is a website which puts a spotlight on one up-and-coming startup per day.

Visiting Perdiem every day will be a brand new experience, and installing the Chrome extension will allow you to discover one new startup per day - every time you open a new tab.

Keep track of hot new startups, ideas, hackers by adding Perdiem as your Chrome new tab today.
